title: In song and dance
creator_credit: Lee Robinson, Don Saunders, Joy Cavill, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Waratah Film Productions
brief_description: The preparations and some scenes of the 1964 Northern Territory Eisteddfod held at Darwin. Local townspeople are joined by cattlemen and First Nations people from far out stations, and get together to produce an eisteddfod unlike any other - with items of all kinds, from classical ballet to First Nations peoples’ music and dance.
